title: Interpretation of cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin with white and black cats in good and evil

preview.html: In the context of the interpretation of dreams provided by the encyclopedia, we present the interpretation of cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning with their different colors. The vision and wonders what it means and what it shows, and his confusion increases, so he turns to the imams and scholars to explain his vision. Interpretation of a white cat in a dream, as mentioned by the greatest dream interpreters who have provided us with all the clues related to what we can see in our dreams, including cats, which are the most domesticated species close to humans, as Man began to domesticate it. About seven thousand years ago, they belong to the family of mammals and there are many types, sizes and shapes of them, but the most beautiful in terms of appearance are white cats. Given the fact that life between cats and humans goes back thousands of years, it is no wonder that they are considered sacred animals in some cultures, For which a large number of statues were erected at that time, especially in Pharaonic culture, for which the punishment for injuring a cat reached the death penalty. Therefore, seeing it in a dream carries many interpretations and indicators related to human life in terms of its reality and future, which we will explain in detail in the following paragraphs in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a cat in a dream is not good, and that is because it indicates the presence of a malicious and deceitful person. In the life of the dreamer, the dreamer must beware of those around him so that he knows who wants good and who wants evil. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees a lot of cats in her dream, this indicates a large number of hypocrites who want evil in her life. If the girl dreams With a white cat, this means that there is a man who is trying to find out her news and is following her and he may be a man who wants to propose to her. But if the color of the cat that the girl saw is black, then this is a sign and warning that there is someone near her who is performing magic and sorcery to harm and harm her, so she must protect herself with the Qur’an. Although the male. If a girl sees that she is afraid of a cat in her dream, this expresses the emotional turmoil she is experiencing. Some imams interpreted the cat in the dream of an unmarried girl as an indication of her desire to break customs and traditions and escape the restrictions imposed on her. A woman is not... A married woman who sees cats in a dream indicates that she may be deceived and deceived by someone close to her in dealings and relationships, whether a relative or a lover. Large numbers of cats in one dream symbolize the coming of many good things in her life, her family, and everything related to her future. When you see a white cat in a dream approaching an unmarried woman and trying to play with her, this is a warning sign that she should be careful of the people around her, as it is possible that there is a treacherous and cunning person who is conspiring against her and wants to harm her. Seeing a white cat with a spot in a dream is not considered An unpleasant vision in general, carrying something that makes her sad, God forbid. An unmarried cat in a dream indicates that there is a young man who will propose to her, but it is likely that

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single girl?

preview.html: Seeing a horse in a dream is considered one of the visions that carry different connotations in the science of dream interpretation, as the interpretations of this dream for a girl vary depending on the color of the horse and various related details. With the same dream. Personal or professional, with different effects. Does this dream bring the girl something useful or portend her? To see a horse in a dream for an ordinary woman. This vision has different meanings, as evidenced by the dream of a horse in a girl’s saucer dream. This vision symbolizes strength, endurance and resourcefulness. If a girl sees a two-headed horse in her dream, this means She is confused about something. If a horse appears in a dream complete to a single woman wearing black, this may indicate mystery and the unknown and may indicate that the dreamer is taking risks in a situation with unknown outcomes. If the horse is white, this indicates purity, prosperity and good luck. The dream That a white horse is chasing a girl is a play on purity or it may indicate that the dreamer is having difficulty understanding issues related to sexuality. Seeing a dead horse in a dream for a woman who was bowling means that something in her life that originally gave you strength has ended. Seeing a herd of Wild horses in a dream indicate a feeling of freedom and lack of responsibilities and duties, and the dream may also indicate that your emotions are out of control. If a woman sees in her dream that she is riding a wild horse, this represents unbridled sexual desires. To dream that you are riding a horse indicates a high status or A position of power or authority. But if a girl sees in her dream that she is riding an uncontrolled horse, this means that she is moving away from her passion. Dream interpretation of a horse trailer in a dream about a bowling woman, which indicates that she is not using her skills sufficiently. The dream of a race track in Dreaming about a horse symbolizes the strength that the dreamer needs to move forward in life and a message to believe that he is capable of succeeding in all his endeavors. Dreaming of a horse for someone indicates a marriage in the near future, if you see it upside down, this indicates bad luck or energy that you are putting into a project Possible. To see a white horse in a dream full of public women. The indicators of seeing a horse in a complete dream for a public woman, if it is white, are as follows: This vision indicates the pure heart and spiritual peace of the visionary, and it also indicates happiness and good luck. On the other hand, the Dreaming of a white pony in a girl’s dream indicates academic or professional success and obtaining an abundant income of money that improves her life. While dreaming of a white horse dancing in an ordinary woman’s dream indicates happy news that will come to her soon, it can also indicate a close marriage with A man of good character and religion. The dream of a white horse fighting in a dream for a bowling woman symbolizes her inability to make the right decisions in her life and her hesitation. To see a black horse in a dream full of public women. The indications of seeing a horse in a dream in full for a public woman, if she is black, are as follows :This vision indicates the continuous effort made by the visionary to achieve her endeavors in the neighborhood

title: Interpretation of fear of childbirth in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and divorced women

preview.html: Through this article from the encyclopedia, you can find an explanation of the fear of childbirth in a dream in detail. The fear of childbirth is actually something that all pregnant women feel when the time of childbirth approaches, for fear for the safety and health of the fetus, but feeling this in a dream carries different meanings among single women. Married and pregnant women. Therefore, in the following lines, we explain to you what dream interpreters said about the meaning of these visions. Fear of childbirth in a dream. The interpretation of fear of childbirth in a dream for an unmarried woman lies in the extent of her fear of important issues in her life in reality. As for the meaning of fear of childbirth in a dream for a married woman It indicates that she is going through a period full of problems in reality, which leads her to feel increased anxiety. Seeing fear of childbirth in a dream reflects for a pregnant woman the extent of her real fear of childbirth and thinking a lot about it. Natural childbirth in a dream, in addition to seeing fear of childbirth in Dreaming, natural childbirth is one of the visions associated with dreams of childbirth, and its meaning indicates the following: Dream interpreters have suggested that seeing childbirth in a dream indicates the health and prosperity that the dreamer enjoys. It is also one of the praiseworthy symbols of childbirth in a dream as it is a sign of a return to God. And repent to it. On the professional level, seeing a natural birth in a dream means obtaining a prestigious job. But if the dreamer is suffering from a disease, then seeing a natural birth in a dream indicates recovery from the disease, and God knows best. Seeing a natural birth in a dream for a married woman indicates her desire The reality of having children. Seeing natural childbirth in a married woman’s dream portends the death of worries and the release of distress. As for the meaning of natural childbirth for an unmarried woman, it indicates her approaching marriage, and God knows best. Seeing natural childbirth in a dream for a divorced woman means that she will return to her ex-husband or She gets married again. Seeing childbirth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing childbirth in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will receive good news about her in reality, and God knows best. In the event that you see the birth of a girl in a dream, this indicates the coming of relief, her comfort, and the relief of worries. If an unmarried woman dreams of giving birth A beautiful child, this indicates her marriage to a good man, and God knows best. When you dream that you give birth easily without effort, this indicates the end of the problems you are facing. If an unmarried woman sees that she is suffering from difficulties in childbirth, this indicates a major crisis that she is experiencing. Seeing childbirth without pregnancy in The dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve what she desires in her life. Interpretation of childbirth for a married woman: Seeing childbirth in a dream is one of the promising visions that shows the abundant goodness of the one who has the vision. Seeing a difficult childbirth in a dream means entering into marital disputes. If she sees childbirth in a dream, this means Stability of her life in reality. If a married woman has not had children before, then this dream means the coming of comfort and well-being

title: Interpretation of a dream about a river in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a river in a dream and what does it mean for a single woman? Does seeing a dry river in a dream have a bad meaning? Is it reasonable to drink river water in a dream? All these questions and others are running in the minds of individuals and they want to know the answers to know their meanings and you may be interested in meeting a turkey in a dream. Who wrote the interpretations to confirm that in reality, seeing the river is one of the visions that has diversity and the indicators vary depending on the appearance that the dreamer had in the dream, and you can recognize On all these indicators, just read the lines of our wonderful article. Seeing a river in a dream indicates the arrival of a very important person to the dreamer, and God knows best. The river symbolizes in the dream giving and overflowing, and it could be a symbol of the painful torment awaiting the dreamer. But if the dreamer sees himself drinking from it, this indicates That he will get a lot of money, but from a very dangerous person. Interpretation of seeing a river in a dream and its meaning. In this paragraph we will learn together about the interpretation of the river in a dream and its meaning, as Ibn Sirin put it in the books of interpretation to know the meaning of this dream, and this interpretation is presented in the following: Ibn Sirin sees Sirin, the interpretation of seeing a river in a dream and its meaning indicates kindness and calm in the event that water appears in the river is clear, and God knows best. But in the event that one sees the river water in an ugly and turbulent way, the interpretation of this vision, according to Ibn Sirin’s opinion, is that there are some problems and calamities that disturb the viewer in the dream. His life. Ibn Sirin says that bathing or bathing in river water in a dream is one of the visions that indicate extreme anguish and anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from, and God knows best. Also, drinking water and bathing from the river indicates a lot of trouble and a feeling of constant anxiety and fear. You may also be interested By knowing: Salt in a dream The interpretation of seeing a frozen river in a dream After we explained above the interpretation of seeing a river in a dream and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin, in the following paragraph we will learn about the connotations indicated by seeing a frozen river in a dream, which are as follows: Seeing a frozen river in a dream indicates the end of distress and the return of The dreamer’s life before these problems, and God knows best. Also, seeing ice in a dream has its own indicators depending on the condition of the skin in the dream. While some scholars believe that seeing a frozen river in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries and the disappearance of distress, as it indicates getting rid of haters, and God knows best. In the event that someone sees a frozen river or ice in a dream, this vision can be a sign of chaos and devastation in which the dreamer lives. Some interpretive scholars believe that this vision indicates material difficulties and difficult financial circumstances. You may also be interested in knowing: Burning clothes in a dream The meaning of seeing the Kawthar River in a dream There are many indications indicated by the interpretation of seeing a river in a dream, whether it is frozen or flowing. On the contrary, seeing the Kawthar River in a dream indicates; Interpretation scholars believe that seeing the Kawthar River in a dream portends goodness and one of the most praiseworthy visions that individuals can have.

title: Interpretation of seeing alcohol in a dream and not drinking it

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wine in a dream and not drinking it. Alcohol is considered a taboo in Islam, so when Muslims see wine in a dream, their level of stress and fear differs from that of non-Muslims, so many Muslims resort to knowing the meaning and interpretation of seeing wine in a dream, and the results also differ. Interpretation Any dream varies depending on the psychological, health, and social condition of each person, so in this article we will learn today about the interpretation of seeing wine in a dream and not drinking it. Interpretation of seeing wine and not drinking it in a dream and seeing a bottle of wine. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing wine in a dream is an unpleasant vision in general. Because it indicates the presence of many sorrows, problems, and fears for the dreamer. Wine in a dream could be a sign of forbidden money that will come to the pioneer without his effort, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is drinking wine until he is drunk, then drunkenness in a dream is evidence of That the dreamer has a lot of money, but he does not thank God for the blessings, because drunkenness in general. In a dream, it is a sign of money, power and status, and that the one who drinks a lot of money, but will not be grateful to the one who gave him this money, and his neglect will increase. And God knows best. But if the dreamer sees himself drunk in his sleep without drinking alcohol, this indicates that the dreamer is very afraid of something, and drinking alcohol in his dream indicates that this fear will disappear and turn into something very good, God willing. And if the dreamer sees himself Drunk in a dream, this is evidence that he is claiming things that do not exist and are not true, and God knows best. Seeing whiskey in a dream is an interpretation by Ibn Shaheen. The scholar Ibn Shaheen agreed with what Ibn Sirin said about seeing wine in a dream, whether he drank it or not. The way he sees this money was forbidden. In other analyses, seeing wine in a dream could be a sign that the dreamer will commit many sins, sins, and disobedience, God forbid. Interpretation of seeing a bottle of wine for a married woman. Seeing wine in a dream, according to interpretation scholars, is not Well at all. Therefore, if the wife sees a bottle of wine in her dream, then this in her dream is a sign of anxiety, delusion, and serious and difficult problems that she faces that she cannot solve, and may await her in a state of turmoil, God forbid. . The anguish and distress may reach the point of losing someone close to her, and the distress may turn upside down and cause her extreme anxiety and fear, and God knows best. Since a married woman sees alcohol in her dream, this is evidence of her bad reputation and that she is not trusted with secrets and does not honor her family, and God is Most High. And I know. Seeing alcohol without drinking it in a dream for an unmarried woman. If a girl who has never been married before sees alcohol in her dream, this is a sign that this girl has a bad reputation, which is absolutely undesirable. Also, an unmarried girl who sees alcohol in Her dream without drinking it indicates that there are many temptations around the girl and that she will fall into one of them, and God alone is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing wine without drinking it in a dream

Interpretation Any dream varies depending on the psychological, health, and social condition of each person, so in this article we will learn today about the interpretation of seeing wine in a dream and not drinking it. Interpretation of seeing wine and not drinking it in a dream and seeing a bottle of wine. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing wine in a dream is an unpleasant vision in general. title: The answer to the interpretation is that I dreamed that my father died and he was dead

preview.html: I dreamed that my father died and he is dead. Some dreams come as a dream and it is a message from God Almighty to some of His servants, about what may happen to them in their future lives, and on another site we will talk in this article about seeing death in general. To explain the question, I dreamed that my father died and he was dead. Seeing death in a dream: A person dreams of dying in a dream without getting tired or getting sick. These dreams show his wonderful life in real life. But if one sees himself naked and then dies, the dream indicates that he will lose all his money and his condition will lead to poverty and loneliness. If one sees his family slapping, crying and screaming while he is dead, then this dream indicates many... Of the problems that will happen to him in the near future, and that many misfortunes will befall him in his life. If someone sees the death of a person with whom he disagrees, scholars interpreted this dream as the disappearance of differences between them, and that the situation will turn into a reconciliation between them. Whoever sees someone he knows dying and then returns to Life, his dream indicates that this person commits sins, but he returns to them, repents for them, and returns to God Almighty. A person’s dream of someone he knows will not die despite being exposed to many accidents, so his dream indicates that this person will suffer and die for him, God willing. With his death The head of state in a dream or one of its scholars, seeing him indicates that a calamity will occur in this country and sadness will overwhelm it. A married woman dreamed in a dream that my father died while he was dead. A married woman’s dream says: I dreamed that my father died while he was dead. Her dreams show the great responsibility that this woman bears and that she falls She is under great psychological and nervous pressure and many burdens in her life, and for your sake the husband does not share any of these burdens, worries and burdens that will affect her and affect her life a lot. Scientists believe that the interpretation of a married woman saying that she dreamed of the death of my father while he was dead is that her energy has been exhausted and she no longer has the ability To endure more problems and worries, and she longs to live in her father’s house in comfort and happiness as she was before. A married woman dreams that her father died while he was dead, or that he appeared and gave her money. She has accumulated debts and her life will improve in the coming days. A married woman dreamed that my father died while he was dead, but he died at home. This dream shows problems between her and her husband and these problems may lead to divorce, so she needs to rearrange her life with her husband to stay away from these problems and not cause them to divorce. A man dreams of the death of his dead father. A man dreams in a dream that the mother of the deceased appears to him and sits with him and then she dies again. Other dreams show this person's intense longing for his mother and that this person always remembers his father, prays for him and tries to do so. To be characterized by the same qualities that his father knew. A man dreamed of his mother’s death again, but in an angry form and that he was upset. His vision indicated that this man does not care about his family members and does not ask about their news and does not provide them with any help or assistance. So it is a message to that person because he needs to repair his relationship with his brothers and mother and needs to take care of his family so that his mother is satisfied with him. When a man sees during his sleep that he is crazy

title: Escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman. Escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman is one of the common visions that happen to many people, and this vision has many connotations and signs, whether good or not. Various. Reconsidering the interpretation of escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman. Escaping from fire in a dream. Fire It is the means by which God punishes infidels and tyrants on the Day of Resurrection, and God has forbidden torment in this world, even if an ant is tormented. Escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman varies in interpretation depending on the gender of the viewer and his psychological and social state at the time of seeing the vision. This vision has many connotations. Sometimes it indicates benefits, and sometimes it shows the evil that will happen to whoever has the vision. Some interpreters see that fire in a dream represents glory, power, and domination through money and prestige. A group of interpreters believes that fire indicates God’s displeasure and committing many crimes. Of sins and mistakes in life, it is a warning and a threat. Some commentators explain that fire is a base for non-human beings such as jinn and devils, which indicates its presence and closeness to the dreamer when he sees fire in his dream. Interpretation of escaping from fire in a dream for a single woman. Many jurists pointed out the interpretation that it is If an unmarried girl sees a fire breaking out in her dream, this indicates that she will soon marry God Almighty. If a girl sees a big fire in her dream and tries to escape from these fires, this is evidence that this girl will face a big problem in her life, but she will be able to overcome it and get out of it. almost. A strong will. And if the unmarried woman sees in her dream that the fire almost burned her, but she was able to escape from it cleverly, then the vision here is evidence that the unmarried woman has many abilities and skills that make her overcome the most difficult circumstances. And if the unmarried woman sees the fire coming out From her house, she crossed that fire and escaped from it, this indicates her rejection of a young man who loves her and proposes to her but does not love him. Interpretation of escaping from fire in a dream for a man: Seeing fire in a man’s dream indicates the presence of many obstacles and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, and that he is worried in his life and uncertain about his future, which It always makes him feel fear and dread. If someone sees fire in a dream and is able to escape from it, this is evidence that the owner of the scenes will be able to confront his problems with boldness and that he will solve them with the utmost levels of reason and wisdom. Interpretation of escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman. There is more than one interpretation of the dream of escaping from fire in a dream for a married woman, and it depends on the form of the fire. Escaping from a bright fire indicates that the woman is making naive decisions. Which makes her regret it later. A dream about escaping from a fire in a married woman’s dream expresses wrong behavior as a result of the limited mentality that characterizes the viewer, which causes her not to take advantage of many of the opportunities that were given to her. If the fire is lit and the married woman feels intense fear of it, what drives her

title: What is the interpretation of a woman’s dream of a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman named Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a woman’s dream in a dream about a single girl by senior scholars: The mirror actually highlights the shape of the face, whether it is beautiful or not, and is used by people who want to see the changes that have occurred to them over time. If If she had a good or bad person, seeing the girl in the mirror may indicate that she stands up for herself so that she will be aware of her character flaws and get rid of them in the future. It expresses good luck in the world if the mirror is clean and beautiful. If it is polluted, this indicates bad luck in the world. Luck and the many problems that the girl will face in the future. Interpretation of a dream about looking in mirrors for a single woman. The vision can indicate the psychological and behavioral state of the girl. She knows bad behavior. If she sees herself looking elegant in the mirror, the dream indicates her imminent marriage to a person with a good reputation and she will live with him A quiet and stable life later. But if she sees that she is wearing uncoordinated clothes, which makes her look ugly in the mirror, then the vision is evidence of her relationship with a disreputable person, which makes her live a miserable life with him, if the marriage has already taken place, and the vision here is a warning to her not to Continuing the relationship with this person. Seeing a mirror in a dream by Ibn Sirin. But if a person sees many mirrors surrounding him in his dream, this means that he has a group of loyal friends, who represent a turning point in his life and emphasize his flaws before his strength so that he can improve himself. But if he sees His face is black, although in reality it is not that color. This is evidence that he speaks ill of people in their absence, and he is known among those with a bad reputation, unfortunately. The vision comes and warns him about the consequences of his actions and he must repent to God for all the sins he has committed. But if the dreamer stops For a long time in front of the mirror, contemplating his face and the state in which the mirror broke for such a piece, there is an indication of the burdens that he carries on his shoulders, which he must face and deal with. In the coming days, it is most likely that these difficulties will arise between him and his family, resulting in bad psychological suffering. The vision may indicate the personality of the visionary, which is characterized by arrogance and condescension towards people. Interpretation of a dream about looking in the mirror for a married woman. A married woman’s mirror is a reflection of her married life and what appears to be stability or turmoil. Therefore, commentators interpreted her vision in several ways that differ depending on the appearance of the woman she resembles: If she sees that her image in the mirror is beautiful, then she will enjoy a calm and stable marital life and enjoy the love and respect of her husband and constant care for his children. But if she finds her face ugly, then this vision indicates many problems in the marriage. She must be wise so that these problems do not escalate and lead to separation, which negatively affects the life of the child

title: Interpretation of seeing a son killed in a dream and its meaning for good and evil

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a son killed in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams because of the bad meaning it can carry, causing panic for its owner, who wants to see its interpretation soon to avoid something bad happening to him or to someone close to him. Murder is one of the taboos that God has forbidden, but the interpretation of the dream varies according to the method of suicide, as the intention itself differs, and the meanings of accidental killing may differ in the case of a father intentionally killing his son. And so on, and because, as usual, through our platform, we are interested in interpreting many dreams, and all of this is based on personal diligence and the opinions of some dream interpreters, but the unseen is known only to God, and He must. A person must keep this in front of his eyes all the time, so let us find out what this dream may indicate through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing a son killed in a dream. Whoever sees that he killed his son in a dream, this means that the father sins against that son, and God Almighty is Most High. The killer in the dream is the oppressor and the killed is the oppressed. There are some other indications that this dream indicates that the dream interpretation of killing in a dream refers to the story of the redemption of our master Abraham and his son Ismail, which indicates the necessity of restoring the religion and the covenant that he made to himself and. That he may have forgotten it. If a man sees that he is killing his son, this is a sign that this son will have a lot in the future and will have the qualities of strength and courage that will enable him to assume great leadership positions. According to what was narrated by one of the imams of dream interpretation, the father who sees that he is killing his son, This is evidence of the father’s suffering in providing for his needs and his concern for them, and his tireless efforts to earn a living to raise him. It may also indicate some problems that will arise between them and will reach the point of estrangement and severing of kinship ties between them. If he sees that he is slaughtering his son with a knife, this means that the father was negligent towards his son, and felt this towards him, or the dreamer’s injustice to some relatives and his attempt to slander. Him. What is the interpretation of murder in a single woman’s dream? If an unmarried daughter sees her father killing her, this indicates anxiety, sadness, and disagreement between them. There are some interpreters who have shown that this vision for an unmarried woman indicates that her father will force her to marry one of the corrupt men. It is also evidence of her injustice towards him, preventing her from completing her education, or preventing her from working, which causes her sadness and fear for him. But if she sees that she is killing her father with a knife, this indicates that she is declaring her disobedience and disobedience to him, or that she is marrying men whom her father does not prefer as her husband. If he sees his unmarried daughter, whom he is trying to kill, running away from him in a dream, this indicates her escape and salvation or her marriage to a good person who will replace him in the future. If he sees that his daughter is trying to confront him and remove the knife from her in an attempt to defend herself, this is an indication that she is bearing responsibility and is marrying someone powerful and influential. Interpretation of seeing a son killed in a dream for a man: It indicates that this man commits many sins and persecutes many people because of The powerful influence he has, as Al
